Package org.ginsim.service.tool.avatar.simulation

Class Simulation

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.service.tool.avatar.simulation.Simulation
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    AvatarSimulation, FirefrontSimulation, MonteCarloSimulation
    public abstract class Simulation
extends Object
    Class defining an abstract simulation and providing facilities for their management.
    Specialized simulations (e.g. Avatar, Firefront, MonteCarlo) can be added.
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Rui Henriques, Pedro T. Monteiro
